data.description_html:
You create and direct the rapid growth of vines, creating a variety of effects.
When you cast the spell, choose one of the following effects:

  • entangle (as the spell)
  • climbing aid (treat as knotted ropes)
  • bind helpless targets (DC 25 to escape)
  • hamper movement (as heavy undergrowth)
  • camouflage (add +4 competence bonus on Hide checks) As a standard action, you may redirect the vines' growth (thus changing the effect).

Material Component: A crown of ivy leaves.
data.name: Vine Mine
